greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=0; for n >= 1, a(n) = 1 + a(n-A070319(n)), where A070319(n) is the maximum value for A000005 (number of divisors) in range 1 .. n.
comment: Number of steps needed to reach zero when starting from k = n and repeatedly applying the map that replaces k by k - A070319(k), where A070319(k) is the maximum value for A000005 (number of divisors) in range 1 .. k.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10080
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 24 2015
